goals.heading: Physical Goals:
goal: Attempts to put socks, shoes and jacket

goals.heading: Social Goals:
goal: Helps clean up during clean up time
Is communicating with others through verbal conversation
Enjoys and is engaged in learning and playing with others

goals.heading: Emotional Goals:
goal: To begin showing empathy for others
Feels safe and confident away from his/her parents
Shows pride in his/her new accomplishments
